FROM video_video_tags tag LEFT JOIN video_overlay_info overlay ON tag.overlay_id = overlay.overlay_id LEFT JOIN video_tag_style_info style ON tag.tag_style_id= style.style_id WHERE tag.video_id=#{videoId} ORDER BY tag.tag_id
